org.apache.giraph.utils

类 FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.utils.FileUtils

  • public class FileUtils
extends Object
    Helper class for filesystem operations during testing

      • createTestDir

        public static File createTestDir(Class<?> vertexClass)
                          throws IOException
        Create a temporary folder that will be removed after the test.
        参数:
        vertexClass - Used for generating the folder name.
        返回:
        File object for the directory.
        抛出:
        IOException

        参数:

        name - File name.
        返回:

                 String name)
                          throws IOException

        参数:
        parent - Parent directory.
        name - Directory name.
        返回:
        File object to temporary file.
        抛出:
        IOException

                           String name,

        参数:
        parent - Parent directory
        name - Name of file
        dir - Is directory?
        返回:
        File object
        抛出:
        IOException
